## Price.adjustments property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Price is deprecated, use ProductPrice.
> 

An array that provides information about tax, weee, or weee\_tax adjustments.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
adjustments?: Maybe<Array<Maybe<PriceAdjustment>>>;
```
